message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $11,000. This product is truly top-notch and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for it.
